name: Dean ♥ Green
description:
Dean LOVES green!

If you love it as much as him, help him to do the good work.

The game is designed for  Games Now Jam #9: Games for Forrest and is in very early developement. Please consider leaving feedback based on the current game version so I know how to improve it!

Controls: Mouse movement

Credits:

Miro Aurela: Game Design, Programming

Sounds:
https://pixabay.com/ (https://pixabay.com/service/license/)
